titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the presentation of a flag of the United States to the children of members of the Armed Forces who die in service.
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the presentation of a flag of the United States to the children of members of the Armed Forces who die in service.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Authorizes payment of the expense of presenting a U.S. flag to the children of members of the Armed Forces who die in service.
